question: How can I track my order?
answer: You can track your order by logging into your account and navigating to the "Order History" section. There
column3: you'll find real-time tracking information for your order.

question: What is your return policy?
answer: Our return policy allows you to return products within 30 days of delivery. Please visit our "Return Policy" page for detailed instructions on how to initiate a return.

question: How do I change my shipping address after placing an order?
answer: To change your shipping address after placing an order
column3: please contact our customer support team as soon as possible. They will assist you in updating the address if your order has not yet shipped.

question: What payment methods do you accept?
answer: We accept a variety of payment methods
column5: and Apple Pay. You can view the full list of accepted payment options during the checkout process.

question: Do you offer international shipping?
column3: we offer international shipping to many countries. During checkout
column4: you can enter your shipping address to see if we deliver to your location and to get estimated shipping costs.

question: How do I apply a coupon code to my order?
column3: proceed to the checkout page. There will be a field where you can enter your code. Once applied
column4: the discount will be reflected in your order total.

question: What is the estimated delivery time for my order?
answer: Estimated delivery times vary depending on your location and the shipping method chosen. You can find an estimated delivery date on the product page and during the checkout process.
